  proposition: Thomas KF Chiu studied the impact of Generative AI on education practices, policies, and research directions.

    entity-attribute relationships:

  proposition: Maria Teresa Baldassarre and researchers analyzed the social impact of generative AI.
    entity-attribute relationships:

    entity-entity relationships:
    Maria Teresa Baldassarre|ANALYZES|Generative AI

  proposition: Yan Chen and Pouyan Esmaeilzadeh investigated privacy and security challenges of generative AI in medical practice.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yan Chen|INVESTIGATES|privacy challenges
    Yan Chen|INVESTIGATES|security challenges

  proposition: Sunnie S. Y. Kim and colleagues examined the impact of large language models' uncertainty expression on user reliance and trust.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sunnie S. Y. Kim|RESEARCHES|large language models
    Sunnie S. Y. Kim|FOCUSES_ON|uncertainty expression
    Sunnie S. Y. Kim|FOCUSES_ON|user reliance
    Sunnie S. Y. Kim|FOCUSES_ON|user trust

    entity-entity relationships:
    Sunnie S. Y. Kim|EXAMINES|Large Language Models

  proposition: Weixin Liang and team monitored AI-modified content at scale, focusing on ChatGPT's impact on AI conference peer reviews.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Weixin Liang|MONITORS|AI-modified content
    Weixin Liang|FOCUSES_ON|ChatGPT impact

    entity-entity relationships:
    Weixin Liang|STUDIES|ChatGPT
    Weixin Liang|INVESTIGATES|AI conference peer reviews

  proposition: Mingmeng Geng and Roberto Trotta researched ChatGPT's transformation of academics' writing style.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mingmeng Geng|RESEARCHES|ChatGPT transformation
    Roberto Trotta|RESEARCHES|ChatGPT transformation

  proposition: Mingmeng Geng and colleagues studied the impact of large language models in academia, from writing to speaking.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mingmeng Geng|RESEARCHES|large language models

    Mingmeng Geng|FOCUSES_ON|academic speaking

  proposition: Anton Korinek explored use cases and implications of generative AI for economic research.
    entity-attribute relationships:

  proposition: Siwei Lyu addressed the challenges of DeepFake and mitigating negative impacts of AI-generated content.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Siwei Lyu|ADDRESSES|DeepFake challenges
    Siwei Lyu|FOCUSES_ON|mitigating negative impacts

    entity-entity relationships:
    Siwei Lyu|STUDIES|DeepFake
    Siwei Lyu|INVESTIGATES|AI-generated content

  proposition: Umar Ali Bukar and researchers developed a decision-making framework for utilizing generative AI in education, using ChatGPT as a case study.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Umar Ali Bukar|DEVELOPS|decision-making framework
    Umar Ali Bukar|FOCUSES_ON|generative AI in education

    entity-entity relationships:
    Umar Ali Bukar|USES|ChatGPT
    Umar Ali Bukar|APPLIES_TO|education
